document.full_text: the government sued deutsche bank ag for more than $1 billion, accusing the german bank of fraud for repeatedly lying to obtain federal guarantees on mortgages it issued.
document.title: u.s. sues deutsche bank in mortgage fraud case
lines_and_colors: the government sued deutsche bank ag for more than $1 billion, accusing the german bank of fraud for repeatedly lying to obtain federal guarantees on mortgages it issued.
